display_long_description:
[media]
Join Discord:  https://discord.gg/ZERYSbXXV6  

**Gloves Up** is a physics-based boxing game featuring the long-awaited single-player career mode fans have been craving.

**Define your legacy:** Rise, peak, and fade across a lifelong career shaped by performance, aging, and relentless training. Play as either male or female!

**Feel the fight:** Every interaction runs on physics, from head-snapping punches to satisfying knockdowns. Even the menus are physics-based.

**Train smart:** Build muscle memory with slowed-down AI in diverse training drills. Master slips, rolls, blocks, combos at your pace! 

**Dynamic opponents:** Each fighter is distinct in appearances and styles—ranging from outside fighters and patient counter punchers to aggressive swarmers and punishing sluggers. All procedurally generated ensuring a fresh supply of new faces during your career. **No two fights play out the same**

**Hype up the crowd** with ring introductions using your profile name. Scale from intimate amateur bouts to glorious pro fights in front of 1,000+ dynamic spectators, feel the adrenaline rush when the crowd gets loud!

**Customize your career:** Dial in your fight style—from quick knockouts to full-length tactical battles. Set round count, duration, break times and more

**Early Access Notice:** Core systems are live and evolving —your feedback will shape the future of the fight. Let’s build this legacy together.
